name: Monaco Telematique
overview:
Monaco Telematique provides networking applications and solutions for corporates and telecommunications. Its products include device management center that helps mobile operators to increase ARPU, promote new services, reduce operational costs, and control handset lifecycle; messaging products that manage the transmission and reporting of short messages and multimedia messages; and intelligent service delivery solutions, such as message gateways, content delivery platforms, gateways for VASP connectivity, and mobile development tools. The company provides roaming solutions that enable operators to improve the interworking with other GSM or CDMA networks. It also offers various services, such as aggregation, marketing analysis, roaming SMS, application hosting, and OTA provisioning. The company serves mobile, wireline, and mobile virtual network operators, as well as value added service providers and SMS-MMS brokers and aggregators.

Monaco Telematique was founded in 1992 and is based in Monaco, Monaco.
